pages.title: Brachiosaurus
pages.text: Scientific name: Brachiosaurus brancai (Giraffatitan)$(br2)Period: Late Jurassic$(br2)Diet: Herbivore$(br2)Behaviour: Sociable, Neutral$(br2)Preferred Biome: Forests
Brachiosaurus has the ability to rear up in order to reach vegetation that is too tall for them to access at ground level.
